head.title: Home - Cuba Independent School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p: We believe that EVERY child can learn, there is no limit to their potential and that by working together, we can make a meaningful contribution to their success.
We are culturally responsive, use critical thinking to reach solutions that make sense for our students and look for every possibility to reward growth.
We are a Pre-K through 12 community school that provides a better way to learn.

img.title: arrows

a.title: Remote Continuous Learning Plan Begins April 6th

img.a: Remote Continuous Learning Plan Begins April 6th
img.div: Cuba ISD will begin its “Remote Continuous Learning Plan” on Monday April 6th, 2020. A remote continuous plan is how we, as a district, will support the learning of our students from now until the end of the school year (2020) due to Covid-19.
img.a: Read More about Remote Continuous Learning Plan Begins April 6th

img.title: arrows

a.title: Online Resources for Students During COVID-19 School Closure

img.a: Online Resources for Students During COVID-19 School Closure
img.div: Cuba Schools has published a list of several educational resources available to students for FREE during the COVID-19 school closure.

img.a: Opt-in to CIS Text Messaging Service
img.div: Parents, Guardians & Staff: You can take advantage of our Text Messaging Service by texting Y to 67587.
